param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css classes of the page, this allows individual module styling

param.name: modulewidth
param.label: Module width
param.description: Width of the Module in Pixels, if left blank, width will be 100%

param.name: mod_pollid
param.label: PollID
param.description: ID of the Poll to be displayed in the module, if left blank, global settings will be applied

param.name: mod_disp
param.label: Polls to Display
param.description: Defines which polls should be displayed in the Polls Module

param.name: mod_order
param.label: Order to display Polls
param.description: Defines the order in which Polls are displayed (or the first if only one)

param.name: mod_hide
param.label: Initially hide options
param.description: Use this option if you have a lot of questions/polls, then initially only Poll titles are displayed, questions/options hidden

param.name: mod_selpo
param.label: Show Select-Box
param.description: If you display only one poll, the user has the possibility to choose the others

param.name: mod_imgvote
param.label: Image for voting button
param.description: Select an image from /images/stories, if you prefer to have a picture instead of the voting-button

param.name: mod_imgresult
param.label: Image for results button
param.description: Select an image from /images/stories, if you prefer to have a picture instead of the results-button
